examples.name: JFPatch: Base64 module
examples.description: Simple example module that decodes a Base64 encoded block

examples.name: JFPatch: Bat and Ball utility
examples.description: Sub-256 byte utility to bounce a ball, and hit it with a bat

examples.name: JFPatch: DDEUtils module
examples.description: My implementation of DDEUtils, which I wrote because otherwise you couldn't use throwback or prefixing without buying the Desktop Development Environment

examples.name: JFPatch: DJF player utility
examples.description: Tool for playing David's Jingle Format tunes

examples.name: JFPatch: External Edit tool
examples.description: Command line tool that can launch an External Editor on a file from within a Taskwindow

examples.name: JFPatch: External Edit library for C
examples.description: An AOF linkable version of the External Edit launcher (which was used in GMail)

examples.name: JFPatch: No Cover Iconbar module
examples.description: Module to ensure that windows never cover the iconbar

examples.name: JFPatch: Task Killer module
examples.description: Module to allow killing of tasks that wouldn't exit

examples.name: JFPatch: Tone Dial utility
examples.description: Give it a phone number and it'll play the tones necessary to call it

examples.name: JFPatch: Serial over TCP module
examples.description: Claims to be a way to replace the serial operations with a TCP connection

examples.name: JFPatch: Patching a utility
examples.description: Example that patches hello-world to say something else

examples.name: C: Demo example
examples.description: Simple module with a test command
